name: Sex Actions - Truth or Dare
description:
You are given a whole selection of entertainment for every taste:
• Sex of Action - take turns with your loved one. Depending on the regime, penalties are possible for refusing to perform.
• Wheel - random tasks, you can download user tasks. Suitable for a party.
• Cubes - rotate the blocks one by one with your favorite one. On the dice random combinations will fall out.
• Stories - a selection of erotic stories, evaluation of stories from real users.

Unlimited access to all functions!
Erotic game for two people.

Know yourself and your partner - flirting and excitement will envelop you.
Start the game - and you will experience new erotic sensations with your partner, immersed in the world of lust in debauchery!
